amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to conduct a study to assess the activities of the U.S. Customs and Border Protection's National Targeting Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-450 to require the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security to submit to the appropriate congressional committees an assessment study of the National Targeting Center and recommendations to strengthen the center, six months after implementation of the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruppersberger amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
